channel.title: Travel on Kelly Ripple
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Kelly Ripple

item.title: BTI Goes International
item.author: kelly.ripple@bti360.com (Kelly Ripple)
item.description: I started with BTI in January. On June 1st, a mere five months later, I found myself on a fully funded international plane ride to the Dominican Republic, alongside an assorted group of BTI teammates and their spouses. Why in the world did BTI send us to the DR, you may ask? We returned to the states a few days ago, and I think I may have a few of the answers.
